      • minMax

        private double minMax(double x,
                      double min,
                      double max)
        Floors values of x larger than max and ciels (increases) values of x smaller than min.
        Parameters:
        x - evaluated parameter, possible returned floored or cieled.
        min - minimum value of x.
        max - maximum value of x.
        Returns:
        Either x, min or max. Depending on value of x.
